lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an article on Monday about the many sports books claiming to chronicle the best or greatest game misidentified, in some editions, the author of “The Boys of Winter,” about the United States hockey team’s defeat of the Soviets at the 1980 Winter Olympics. He is Wayne Coffey — not Charles J. Sanders, whose book with the same title is about United States ski troops in World War II.
